metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0494 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the Java SE and Java SE Embedded components in Oracle Java SE 6u105, 7u91, and 8u66 and Java SE Embedded 8u65 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0494` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu55 - 55.1-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

openjdk-8-demo - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-jamvm - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-source - 8u72-b15-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> introduced as part of the CVE-2015-4844 fix

criterions.comment: icu package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.1-7ubuntu0.1').
openjdk-8 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8u72-b15-1').
